transfer_functions.name: transferFrom
transfer_functions.description: Transfers tokens from a sender to a recipient.

transfer_functions.name: move
transfer_functions.description: Moves tokens from one address to another.

other_functions.name: approve
other_functions.description: Approves a spender to transfer tokens on behalf of the owner.

other_functions.name: burn
other_functions.description: Burns tokens from the owner's account.

other_functions.name: deny
other_functions.description: Denies access to a particular address.

other_functions.name: mint
other_functions.description: Mints new tokens to the specified address.

other_functions.name: permit
other_functions.description: Permits a spender to transfer tokens from an owner's account.

other_functions.name: pull
other_functions.description: Pulls tokens from the specified address.

other_functions.name: push
other_functions.description: Pushes tokens to the specified address.

other_functions.name: rely
other_functions.description: Grants permission to an address.

other_functions.name: DOMAIN_SEPARATOR
other_functions.description: Returns the domain separator used in EIP-712.

other_functions.name: PERMIT_TYPEHASH
other_functions.description: Returns the typehash for the permit.

other_functions.name: allowance
other_functions.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that a spender is allowed to spend.

other_functions.name: balanceOf
other_functions.description: Returns the balance of an account.

other_functions.name: decimals
other_functions.description: Returns the number of decimals used by the token.

other_functions.name: name
other_functions.description: Returns the name of the token.

other_functions.name: symbol
other_functions.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

other_functions.name: totalSupply
other_functions.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

other_functions.name: version
other_functions.description: Returns the version of the contract.

other_functions.name: wards
other_functions.description: Returns the wards of the contract.

other_functions.name: LogNote
other_functions.description: Emits logs with arbitrary data.

other_functions.name: Approval
other_functions.description: Emits when tokens are approved for a spender.

other_functions.name: Transfer
other_functions.description: Emits when tokens are transferred.
